Articles.Content:
Are there any tools to help with the creation of IVA Internals? Specifically I've seen some kind of drag-and-drop mentioned in the MOARdV's AS Thread. I've tried searching the forums, but to no avail.

(For context I'm currently using trial and error to position and rotate the props correctly by text editing the .cfg file)

Edited August 16, 2022 by afyber
Probably needed the context

You can install Unity (it's free for download) and KSP's Part Tools from

to load an IVA in Unity and add / size / position props.  It's not quite drag-and-drop, but it's way easier than trial-and-error.
Thanks so much, this'll really be an improvement!
